page.title: 14SHERIFF HUTTON AT HOME
page.content: Most homes are lived in by two adults (man and wife) and on average two children.Most families have large enough gardens to grow vegtables and fruit themselves.Common domestic appliances to assist around the house are washing machines,vacuum cleaners, cookers,freezers,food mixers and liquidizers.Generally food is purchesed from large supermarkets near York-buying fortnightly or even monthly;or from local grocers and butcher.Most families have their mian meal in the evening.There are many activities in the village to attend, otherwise evening home activities include T.V.,radio,records and tapes,reading and more recently computers.Another aspect of home life includes the keeping of pets,the most popular bieng dogs and cats,followed by rabbits,guinea pigs,and hamsters.
